title: Dream a Little Crazy – Architecture in Helsinki
brief_description: Renowned for their colourful and crazy videos, Architecture in Helsinki’s clip for Dream A Little Crazy (2013) is no exception. A collaboration between body architect Lucy McRae and designer Rachel Wingfield, the music video presents a “biological bakery” as it creates an edible anatomy.

constellations_primary.name: Dream A Little Crazy: The next stage of human evolution
constellations_primary.description: Collaborators Lucy McRae and Rachel Wingfield created a ‘biological bakery’ for Architecture In Helsinki’s "Dream A Little Crazy". Manufacturing a series of mass-produced band members the clip explores speculative science and the future of the human body’s evolution.

title_for_label: Dream a Little Crazy – Architecture in Helsinki
description: Renowned for their colourful and crazy videos, Architecture in Helsinki’s clip for ‘Dream A Little Crazy’ was no exception. A collaboration between body architect Lucy McRae and designer Rachel Wingfield, the music video presents a “biological bakery” as it creates an edible anatomy. The Melbourne alt-pop darlings pointed to properties such as The Rocky Horror Picture Show (1975), Weird Science (1985) and Frankenstein as influences for the concept.
